Token.Abstract: The NChartSizeAxisDataSource protocol provides methods to control data on the size axis.
Get minimal size of markers on the screen in pixels.

Parameter.Name: sizeAxis
Parameter.Abstract: - the size axis to obtain the minimal size for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the minimal size of the markers on the screen in pixels.

Token.Abstract: Get maximal size of markers on the screen in pixels.

Parameter.Name: sizeAxis
Parameter.Abstract: - the size axis to obtain the maximal size for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the maximal size of the markers on the screen in pixels.

Token.Abstract: Get minimal value of markers' sizes. If no implementation is provided, the minimal size is calculated according to the data.

Parameter.Name: sizeAxis
Parameter.Abstract: - the size axis to obtain the minimal value for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the minimal value of markers' sizes. It may be nil that is equivalent to the absence of implementation.

Token.Abstract: Get maximal value of markers' sizes. If no implementation is provided, the maximal size is calculated according to the data.

Parameter.Name: sizeAxis
Parameter.Abstract: - the size axis to obtain the maximal value for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the maximal value of the markers' sizes. It may be nil that is equivalent to the absence of implementation.
